author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

I applied clang-format to the __CommonTools/MVAUtils__ package.

Additionally, I took the advantage of merging the `.h` and `.cc` file of the (single) plugin in that package as recommended by the new CMSSW code guidelines.

#### PR validation:

code compiles.
title: CommonTools/MVAUtils clang-format and merge plugins .h and .cc files
